hero.subHeading: Committed to Excellence all Academic Courses
hero.content: Established in 2002, Bhondekar Shiksha Sansthan, Bhandara stands as a dynamic educational group delivering quality learning across nursing and allied healthcare fields, along with colleges dedicated to administration and other professional & academic disciplines. With advanced teaching facilities and an experienced faculty, BSS creates an atmosphere where knowledge meets values and real-world readiness. Shape a future filled with opportunity and take the first step toward professional success today.

bssContent.heading: The BSS Legacy
bssContent.description: Bhondekar Shiksha Sansthan, Bhandara is an esteemed educational organization committed to transforming society through quality education in the fields of law, administration and medical science and employment generation. The institution offers a wide range of educational programs that focus on academic excellence and community service. With experienced faculty, advanced laboratories and a student-centric approach, BSS is a symbol of trust and excellence in Maharashtra’s education field.
points: Learning from school to undergraduate programs
Focus on practical and skill-based learning

aboutCards.title: History
aboutCards.text: Founded in 2002, BSS began its journey with a vision to provide an inclusive and advanced level of education in various fields in Bhandara. Over two decades, the institution has established schools, BA / MA colleges, institutes for nursing, physiotherapy and Ayurvedic that now serve as pillars of learning in the Vidarbha region.

aboutCards.title: Aim
aboutCards.text: To develop competent and ethical professionals across law, administration and healthcare sectors. BSS blends academic knowledge with human values, ensuring every learner contributes meaningfully to society, including inclusive learning for specially abled children, while inspiring lifelong learning and dedication across schools and colleges.

aboutCards.title: Objectives
aboutCards.text: We are committed to transforming the Bhandara district into a center of excellence for schools, colleges and universities across diverse fields of education. By expanding learning and career opportunities for the youth of Vidarbha, BSS works to ensure knowledge reaches every home empowering communities through education growth.

rankings.title: Proudly Distinguished
rankings.highlight: by Our Prestigious Rankings and Accreditations
rankings.description: Bhondekar Shiksha Sansthan is recognized for excellence in the fields of STEM ((Science, Tech, Engineering & Math), Business Administration, Law, Nursing & Ayurvedic Medicines. The institution’s programs are known for their rigorous academic standards and strong focus on community health. Through quality teaching and dedicated service, BSS continues to set benchmarks in various sectors.

visionMission.heading: Vision & Mission
description: BSS envisions creating compassionate healthcare professionals devoted to human welfare, striving for global excellence in medical and nursing education, research, and service while bringing positive societal change through education, healthcare, and employment opportunities for underprivileged communities.

newsEvents.heading: News & Events
newsEvents.subHeading: To inspire and empower our students, we regularly organize academic, cultural and healthcare-driven events annually. The upcoming Joint Annual Gathering, Rhythm 2025 celebrates the spirit of service through sports, cultural programs and inspirational sessions by eminent guests.

empoweringCon.heading: Education For Every Ability / For Differently-Abled Students
description: Every child deserves the right to learn and achieve their fullest potential. Bhondekar Shiksha Sansthan is deeply dedicated to creating an atmosphere that supports students with disabilities.

collegesData.title: Pooja Nursing College, Bhandara
collegesData.desc: Offers advanced nursing education with modern labs, clinical training and an experienced faculty team. Students develop strong medical skills and professionalism, preparing them for rewarding careers in the healthcare sector.

collegesData.title: Bhojrajji Bhondekar Ayurvedic Mahavidyalaya
collegesData.desc: Focused on traditional healing and modern medical knowledge, the college offers a strong foundation in Ayurveda. Students study herbal medicine, therapies and clinical practice, preparing for careers in natural health care and research.

collegesData.title: Bhojrajji Bhondekar Physiotherapy Mahavidyalaya
collegesData.desc: The college provides quality physiotherapy education with advanced labs, expert faculty and real hospital practice. Students learn rehabilitation techniques & patient treatment approaches, preparing them for successful roles in physiotherapy.

collegesData.title: Bhojrajji Bhondekar Medical College (Proposed)
collegesData.desc: The upcoming medical college aims to provide world-class medical education, research opportunities and advanced healthcare services. It is planned to include modern labs, experienced faculty, and a future-ready campus for aspiring doctors.

collegesData.title: PES Ayurvedic Rugnalay
collegesData.desc: Dedicated to natural healing, this hospital provides Ayurvedic treatments including Panchakarma, herbal therapy and lifestyle care. With trained doctors, patients receive holistic wellness support while students gain hands-on learning.

collegesData.title: Manjulabai Bhondekar Mahavidyalaya
collegesData.desc: This college prepares students for administrative and government-sector careers. With experienced faculty and competitive exam guidance, learners build confidence for future roles in public service and administration.

collegesData.title: Dr. Babasaheb Ambedkar MR School
collegesData.desc: This school provides a supportive residential learning atmosphere for students with special needs. With dedicated teachers and a caring campus, children grow with confidence and essential life skills for a better future.

collegesData.title: Universal BA Mahavidyalaya, Nerla
collegesData.desc: It’s a college dedicated to creating future leaders in public administration. Students gain practical knowledge and strong understanding of governance. The campus encourages learning through discussions and academic help.

collegesData.title: Sant Gadgebaba MR School, Nerla
collegesData.desc: Sant Gadgebaba School is built on compassion! This institution empowers special-needs students through training and co-curricular learning. Promotes independence and dignity, helping every child discover their abilities with care.

collegesData.title: Late Jamunabai Bhondekar MR School, Umri
collegesData.desc: A safe and nurturing home for differently-abled learners. The school focuses on education and emotional support, ensuring each child receives equal opportunities and respect while learning and living in a positive environment

collegesData.title: Late Jamunabai Bhondekar Mahavidyalaya, Navegaon
collegesData.desc: Focusing on academic excellence and professional readiness, the college offers a structured B.A. program for students aiming for public administration fields. Workshops and interactive sessions help learners grow academically.

collegesData.title: PES Multi-speciality Hospital and Research Centre
collegesData.desc: PES MultiSpeciality Hospital & Research Centre provides advanced medical care across departments, combining experienced doctors and patient-focused services to treat acute and chronic conditions with accuracy.
